title: Remove hardcoded Atlas model from DRC practice task worlds

content.raw: Looking at the DRC practice task .world files, the Atlas model is hardcoded into them. This makes it cumbersome to modify them to use another Atlas model (or another robot altogether, which should be useful for Track A teams) and essentially forces users to copy world files and modify them. Given how model files can be included in each other and the general focus on modularity and flexibilty for Gazebo, it should certainly be possible to provide a better solution.
